name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frederick SIMS, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J„ and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frederick SIMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Mitchell S. Lipschutz, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
359 A.2d 179
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frederick SIMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 12, 1976.
Decided July 6, 1976.
Mitchell S. Lipschutz, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., David Miehelman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J„ and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
